The Mice Who Could Sing: A Musical Adventure - A group of mice with extraordinary singing abilities embark on a quest to save their home from destruction by a greedy developer. Along the way, they learn the power of teamwork, perseverance, and the importance of following their dreams. The musical features catchy tunes, lively choreography, and a heartwarming story that will leave audiences cheering for more.

Mouse-Tastic Voyage - A group of mice discover a magical portal that transports them to a fantastical world filled with talking animals, enchanted forests, and hidden treasures. As they navigate this new world, they learn valuable lessons about bravery, creativity, and the importance of exploring new horizons. With a blend of adventure, comedy, and music, this show will delight audiences of all ages.

Rodent Rockstars - In a world where mice are known for their musical talents, a group of aspiring musicians must work together to create the ultimate rock band. From jam sessions to concerts, these mice will stop at nothing to make their dreams a reality. With a mix of original songs, iconic covers, and hilarious antics, Rodent Rockstars will have audiences singing along and dancing in the aisles.

The Great Mouse Opera - In a grand opera house, a group of mice must work together to create a masterpiece performance that will impress the most discerning critics. With a blend of drama, comedy, and music, this show will take audiences on a journey of creativity, perseverance, and the power of art to bring people together. As the mice overcome obstacles and learn to work together, they will create a truly unforgettable performance.

Mouse Magic - In a world where mice have a special gift for magic, a group of young mice must learn to harness their powers and use them for good. With the help of a wise old mentor and a cast of colorful characters, these mice will embark on a journey of self-discovery, friendship, and the importance of using their talents to make a positive impact on the world.
